means: 港口工人，码头装卸工人

sentence.Network_en: The men and women who work at the ports are called longshoremen or dockworkers.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些在港口工作的人被称作码头搬运工(longshoreman) 或码头工人(dockworker).

entry.def: A longshoreman is a person who works in the docks, loading and unloading ships.

means.word_mean: 1. a laborer who loads and unloads vessels in a port

auth_sentence.content: Bruder and Wiese are by no means the only cops whom Dunleavy has defended in his longshoreman's English in recent years.
